SEARCH
Package env.objects.structures

Class Tree

java.lang.Object
env.objects.structures.MapStructure
env.objects.structures.BreakableStructure
env.objects.structures.Tree
public class Tree extends BreakableStructure
Represents a tree structure on the map. Trees are breakable but not repairable, and they respawn after a certain duration when destroyed.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    Tree(String name, int maxLife, int respawnDuration, Pose pose)
    Constructs a new Tree with the specified name, maximum life points, respawn duration, and pose.

  • Constructor Details

    • Tree

      public Tree(String name, int maxLife, int respawnDuration, Pose pose)
      Constructs a new Tree with the specified name, maximum life points, respawn duration, and pose.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the tree.
      maxLife - the maximum hit points of the tree.
      respawnDuration - the duration (in milliseconds) before the tree respawns after being destroyed.
      pose - the initial position and orientation of the tree.

  • Method Details

    • isRespawning

      public boolean isRespawning()
      Checks if the tree is currently respawning.
      Returns:
      true if the tree is respawning, false otherwise.

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage(int damage)
      Inflicts damage to the tree. If the damage destroys the tree, a respawn timer is started.
      Overrides:
      takeDamage in class BreakableStructure
      Parameters:
      damage - the amount of damage to inflict.
